TopicTitle: Anyone interested in helping me start a animated webseries on YouTube?

Articles.Content: I'm not really committed yet, and was just wondering if people would be willing to help. I would want some writers, animators, and voice actors, to help. I asked the SCP:CB forums, but didn't get much of a response (yet), so I'm asking the KSP forums. I do have this guy friended on steam, though we're not really "friends" at all, and he doesn't have the style I'm looking for. Also, if you can think of the title for the channel, I'll give you a cookie (not really though, I have no cookies ).
What software will you used for the animation?

I'm not really committed yet, and was just wondering if people would be willing to help. I would want some writers, animators, and voice actors, to help. I asked the SCP:CB forums, but didn't get much of a response (yet), so I'm asking the KSP forums. I do have this guy friended on steam, though we're not really "friends" at all, and he doesn't have the style I'm looking for. Also, if you can think of the title for the channel, I'll give you a cookie (not really though, I have no cookies ).

Animating and voice acting,

Sign me up (if you're using blender, if not, i'll do voice acting... maybe, I'm pretty busy.)

Channel name? Well, it depends on what you're going to do.
I am still deep in the learning process of blender, but I'd be glad to help.
I was thinking more of 2d animation, but maybe 3d would work, what do other people think?

I was thinking more of 2d animation, but maybe 3d would work, what do other people think?

I guess it depends on whether or not you have ANY of the experience, or any of the pre-work done (like the scenes, models characters, etc...)

I guess it depends on whether or not you have ANY of the experience, or any of the pre-work done (like the scenes, models characters, etc...)

Nope, no experience with anything. I just have a lot of ideas and no means of expressing them, that's why I'm asking for assistance.

Nope, no experience with anything. I just have a lot of ideas and no means of expressing them, that's why I'm asking for assistance.

So you're talking about being like a Writer/director?

So you're talking about being like a Writer/director?

I guess a writer, yes.
